name: IslamicCalendar
0:
”Alexa start islamic calendar”
”Alexa, ask islamic calendar what is the date”
”Alexa, ask islamic calendar which date do we have today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: islamic calendar
des:
The skill provides the current date in the lunar Hijri calendar, or the so called islamic calendar.

Icon made by Business Dubai from www.flaticon.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
